Trade/Device Name(s): Simplexa Flu A/B & RSV Direct Gen II
Simplexa Flu A/B & RSV Positive Control Pack
Regulation Name(s): Respiratory Viral Panel Multiplex Nucleic Acid Assay
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for DiaSorin Molecular Simplexa Flu A/B & RSV Direct Gen II multiplex nucleic acid assay and Positive Control Pack for respiratory virus detection
Indications for Use Summary: Differential diagnosis of influenza A, influenza B, and RSV viral infections in humans using nasopharyngeal swab specimens with the LIAISON MDX instrument; the Positive Control Pack is for quality control with the associated assays.
